title: Quality Management Leadership Strategy Design for Sports Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Concepts of Sports Industry Operations and Management, Organizational Leadership Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening case analysis and project-based learning to enable practitioners to independently design and apply quality management strategies within their organizations.

learning_goals: Learners can identify core elements of visionary leadership in sports organizational settings and apply them to practice.
Learners can establish concrete action plans to promote organizational learning.
Learners can design and evaluate employee fulfillment improvement strategies from a quality management perspective.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
